alert.note: Alert for Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 30 at 5:32PM EST until December 31 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EST/500 PM CST/ FOR CENTRAL HENRY...CLAY AND NORTHWESTERN EARLY COUNTIES... At 531 PM EST/431 PM CST/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fort Gaines, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Fort Gaines, Bellville, Bluffton, Shorterville, Walter F. George Lock And Dam, Walter F George Lake, Hayes, Pecan, Graball, Jones Crossing, Suttons Corner, Fort Gaines-Clay Airport, Harrisons Mill, Barnes, Hardwickburg, Zetto, Colomokee, Murphy Station and Screamer. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
